attributes.action: ban the department of culture, media and sport from running the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the above department have shown themselves to be so out of touch with the British population by banning the Red Arrows display at the 2012 Olympics, I feel that they are the last people who should be entrusted with running the event.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
